Key: I just started walking like usual, but...

(Having the walk be over as soon as we reach home...
We can't just do that.)
Hey, Papa?
Hm? What is it, Rio?
Someone is following us.
Huh?
What's the matter?
...?! I thought I heard Origami. Haha... It can't be.
Can't it? Behind you.
Behind... me?
(I turned around and there was no one there.)
...Ahh, don't scare me.
What a coincidence to see you here.
H-H-H-H-Hey?! O-Origami?! What are you doing here...

I was taking a stroll with you on my mind, when I
bumped into you by coincidence. A fateful encounter.
No, no, that's definitely reaching...
Hey, Papa? Is she Origami Tobiichi?
Oh, Rio. Can you hold on a minute...

Is she involved with you, Shido? I am Origami
Tobiichi. I'm like Shido's wife.

No, she's Tonomachi's relative. Hey wait... Don't tell
her absurd things.
Absurd? I don't know what you're talking about.
Oh, come on...
Papa. Did you get married to Tobiichi-san?
NO! We're not like that!
Then another kind of relationship? A lover?
That's right. We have yet to submit the documents.

I told you we're not like that! A classmate, she's my
classmate.
Yeah, I know. Ahahaha! You're so funny, Papa.

...You know, Origami jokes a lot. Don't take her
seriously, okay Rio?
Okay, got it! I just believe half of it, right?
I-I didn't say that, but... Yeah something like that.

Shido, I want to ask you something. If she's
Tonomachi's relative... Why is she calling you Papa?
Hm? Because Papa is Papa.
Ah, I guess I look like her dad.
I see. As long as she's not your true child, it's okay.
If that were to be true, that wouldn't be funny...
...What's your name?
Rio!
I see. There, there.

Hehe. That tickles. But you're good at it, Tobiichi-
san!
Thank you. How do you know my name?
Papa kinda told me.
Shido, I am touched by your love.

(What is up with this combination... I'm getting tired
of dealing with them...)

(We went to the park and played on the swings until
the sun set.)
Rio has to go soon.
Oh, is it time to see Marina?
Yeah. I promised her.
I see. Did you have fun?
Yes. I had a lot of fun.
Okay, good.
Well... Bye, Papa, Tobiichi-san.
I want a child like you with Shido.
Hey Origami... Give her an appropriate goodbye.
Bye-bye Rio.
Later, Rio.
Okay. Bye, you two!

(...Hey wait. I had something to ask Marina and I totally
forgot. Oh well, next time I see her―)
I forgot to tell you something, Papa.
Hm? What is it?
If you're going to visit today... Park, okay?
(Rio whispered into my ear.)
...Okay.
Bye-bye!
Shido, what did Rio say?
...Thanks for today. I guess she was shy?
(I couldn't tell her what Rio told me.)
I see. I can't believe she's related to Tonomachi.
I know. Totally not alike.
(Well probably because they're not related.)

Shido, be careful... I have a feeling she'll eventually
become one strong enemy.
What's that supposed to mean?
(I gave Origami a wry smile.)
